page.title: 05FACTS ABOUT BLACKHILL QUARRY
page.content: ECC work 5 quarries in the area. The quarry is roughly 60 acres. Produces hardest stone - Quartzite. 11 employees from Exmouth/Lympstone. Open 7am - 8pm daily;Sat.am only. The deepest pit is 62m. deep in area 4. Digs out 1500 tonnes of gravel a day. Cost of product is Â£4.75 per tonne. Uses Â£6000 of electricity a month. Product value Â£1million+ p.a.. 3 diggers 4 lorries + 8 delivery lorries are used. Silt pond is most dangerous place. Biggest customer is Readymix (ECC hold 49% share in company) Machines used since 1936. Average weekly wage is Â£140 220,000 tonnes reserve in stock.
